values: Holding on to Your Faith in the Midst of Suffering: JobHolding on to Your Faith in the Midst of Suffering: Job

Jesus bore our ultimate curse and punishment on the cross. Any discipline we now receive is not to punish us, but to spur us on in the path toward Christlikeness.Jesus bore our ultimate curse and punishment on the cross. Any discipline we now receive is not to punish us, but to spur us on in the path toward Christlikeness.
